title: 79x1: Conflict of Interest Laws and Intergovernmental Personnel Act (IPA)
summary:
This opinion discusses the applicability of the Ethics in Government Act to personnel servicng on detail under the Intergovernmental Personnel Act. 

Notes: [Note: The conclusion in this opinion was modified by amendments to the Intergovernmental Personnel Act (IPA). For a current discussion of application of conflict of interest laws to detailees from state and local governments, see OGE Informal Advisory Opinion 02x11.]
